name.ja: <ruby>神<rt>しん</rt></ruby><ruby>星<rt>せい</rt></ruby>なる<ruby>繋<rt>けい</rt></ruby><ruby>束<rt>そく</rt></ruby>

text.en:
Activate 1 of these effects, also you cannot Special Summon from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except Xyz Monsters.
● Discard 1 card, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "tellarknight" or "Constellar" monster from your Deck with a different Type from the monsters you control.
● Target face-up monsters your opponent controls, up to the number of "tellarknight" and "Constellar" monsters you control; negate their effects until the end of this turn.
You can only activate 1 "Stellarnova Bonds" per turn.
